thread.title: Easybook announces its Proud Partnership with Taiwan High Speed Rail
thread.title_full: Easybook announces its Proud Partnership with Taiwan High Speed Rail

author: prbuzz.com
title: Easybook announces its Proud Partnership with Taiwan High Speed Rail
text:
Easybook has expanded yet again and this time the expansion is huge. Easybook, the largest online ticket booking portal announces its association with Taiwan Railway. With this recent launch in Easybook's platform, customers can now book tickets on Taiwan High Speed Rail.
The Taiwan Rail booking service in Easybook allows travellers to opt for various packages in Taiwan High Speed Rail. They can pick from 3 day pass, 3 day flexible pass, 5 day standard joint pass and 5 day express joint pass. With this service you will not simply travel, but would get to savor the culture sentiments of Taiwan townships like Taipei, Banqiao, Taoyuan, Hsinchu, Taichung, Chiyayi, Tainan and Zuoying.
Taiwan is a beautiful country with countless mountains to arrest your looks and to indulge your senses. If you are planning a trip to experience the alluring coastal views of Taiwan, the Easybook way is the most preferred. The Taiwan High Speed Rail is a magnificent service introduced in Easybook to give you the best travel experience.
With more than 100 partnerships and more than 10000 buses plying per day, Easybook has online booking services for buses, trains and ferries from various destinations in Singapore, Indonesia and Malaysia. Users can book their tickets with ease from anywhere to everywhere, only a stable internet connection required. All in all, Easybook is a hassle free and convenient online booking portal with a large variety of trip options.
